title: Send Post-Project CSAT Survey
description: After a project is closed, a project manager sends a Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) survey to the main project sponsor.

tasks.description: Identify the primary contact/sponsor for the recently closed project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager finds the correct contact person.

tasks.description: Send the standard post-project CSAT survey.
tasks.expected_outcome: The survey is successfully sent to the customer.

tasks.description: Review the submitted feedback and share it with the project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team receives feedback on their performance.
